content:
## n8n@1.18.0 View the [commits](https://github.com/n8n-io/n8n/compare/n8n@1.17.1...n8n@1.18.0) for this version.
**Release date:** 2023-11-22 This release contains new features and bug fixes.
#### Template creator hub Built a template you want to share? This release introduces the n8n Creator hub. Refer to the [creator hub Notion doc](https://www.notion.so/n8n-Creator-hub-7bd2cbe0fce0449198ecb23ff4a2f76f) for more information on this project.
#### Node input and output search filter Cloud Pro and Enterprise users can now search and filter the input and output data in nodes. Refer to [Data filtering](/data/data-filtering.md) for more information.
For full release details, refer to [Releases](https://github.com/n8n-io/n8n/releases) on GitHub.
